package main

import "fmt"

func cal(a int, cal string, b int) int {
  switch cal {
  case "+":
    return a + b
  case "-":
    return a - b
  case "*":
    return a * b
  case "/":
    return a / b
  default:
    return 0
  }
}

func main() {
  var a, b int
  var sig string

  // fmt.Scanln(&a, &sig, &b)

  fmt.Scanln(&a)
  fmt.Scanln(&sig)
  fmt.Scanln(&b)

}

package main

func maxn(arr []int, n int) int {
  var flag int = arr[0]
  for i := 1; i < n; i++ {

  }

}

lv3plus -Sortï¼

æœ¬æ¥æOIé‚£ä¼šæ’åºç®—æ³•éƒ½å¿˜å¾—å·®ä¸å¤šäº†ï¼Œï¼Œç°åœ¨åˆè®©å†™

ç´¢æ€§å­¦äº†å­¦åŸºæ•°æ’åºï¼Œå®ç°äº†ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œï¼Œä¸çŸ¥é“æœ‰æ²¡æœ‰bug

package main

import "fmt"

func maxn(arr []int, n int) int {
  var flag int = arr[0]
  for i := 1; i < n; i++ {
    if arr[i] > flag {
      flag = arr[i]
    }
  }
  return flag
}

func insSort(a []int, exp int, n int) {
  for i := 1; i < n; i++ {
    flag := a[i]
    j := i - 1
    for j >= 0 && a[j]/exp < flag/exp {
      a[j+1] = a[j]
      j--
    }
    a[j+1] = flag
  }
}

func radixSort(a []int, n int) {
  mxn := maxn(a, n)
  mxExp := 1
  for mxn >= 10 {
    mxn /= 10
    mxExp *= 10
  }

  for i := 1; i != mxExp; i *= 10 {
    insSort(a, i, n)
  }
}

func main() {
  var n int
  a := make([]int, 10)
  fmt.Scanln(&n)
  for i := 0; i < n; i++ {
    fmt.Scanf("%d", &a[i])
  }
  radixSort(a, n)
  fmt.Println(a[:n])
}

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Klein Log, a normal website.

æ­¡è¿ä¾†åˆ°ä¸€å€‹æ™®é€šçš„ç¶²ç«™ï¼šå…‹èŠå› è¨˜éŒ„

Heading 1

äºŒç´šæ¨™é¡Œ

é€™æ˜¯å¼•ç”¨

It is a
T A B
L Â  E
\[{ F_n=\frac{\phi^n - \psi^n}{\phi - \psi} = \frac{\phi^n - \psi^n}{\sqrt5}\\\\ \phi = \frac{1 + \sqrt5}2\\\\ \psi = \frac{1 - \sqrt5}2 }\] 
#include <cstdio>
#include <cctype>

const int MAXN = 10010;

int fa[MAXN], rank[MAXN];

inline int getInt() {
  int sum(0); char _c;
  while (!isdigit(_c = getchar()));
  do sum = sum * 10 + _c - '0';
  while (isdigit(_c = getchar()));
  return sum;
}

int getfa(int x) { return fa[x] == x ? x : fa[x] = getfa(fa[x]); }

inline bool querySet(int x, int y) { return getfa(x) == getfa(y); }

inline void mergeSet(int x, int y) {
  int fx = getfa(x), fy = getfa(y);
  if (rank[fx] > rank[fy]) ++rank[fx], fa[fy] = fa[fx];
  else ++rank[fy], fa[fx] = fa[fy];
}

int main() {
  int n = getInt(), m = getInt();
  for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) fa[i] = i;
  do {
    int z = getInt(), x = getInt(), y = getInt();
    if (z - 2) mergeSet(x, y);
    else puts(querySet(x, y) ? "Y" : "N");
  } while (--m);
}
